Workshops.name: C++
Workshops.description: In this workshop, you will learn C++ basics and improve your skills through solving problems. Also, you will learn about OOP and its concepts. Also, you will apply what you learned through delivering a final project.

Workshops.name: Arduino
Workshops.description: After this workshop, you will be able to interface with the Arduino and many electronic components to implement hardware projects (by using Arduino C language)

Workshops.name: Embedded
Workshops.description: After this workshop, you will be able to interface with the AVR microcontroller and its peripherals to implement hardware and simulation projects (by using C language). Having a background about C or C++ language is a must.
content: Revision on C + introduction to Embedded systems
Introduction to AVR MCU + GPIO + interfacing with LEDs, switches, 7 segments

Workshops.name: Data Structure
Workshops.description: In this workshop, you will learn about data structures using C language. Also, you will apply what you learned through delivering mini projects after each topic.
content: Structures, pointers, static VS dynamic allocation

Workshops.name: MATLAB
Workshops.description: In this workshop, you will learn about Matlab basics, OOP and GUI. Also, you will apply what you learned through delivering a final project.
content: Variable no. of arguments + Function handles and nested functions + Live scripts

Workshops.name: Frontend Web Development
Workshops.description: In this workshop, you will learn how to build the webpage that users interact with which is called client-side or front-end web development. At the end of the workshop, you are going to build your own website.

Workshops.name: Backend Web Development
Workshops.description: In this workshop, you will learn how to build a REST API and deal with databases. This is called server-side or back-end web development. At the end of the workshop, you are going to build your own REST API for your website.

Workshops.name: Mobile App Development
Workshops.description: In this workshop, you will learn to build mobile app using flutter which is a cross-platform software development framework that was presented by Google. It's managed you to build app for Android and iOS with same code. In the end of the workshop, you will build your own complete app.

Workshops.name: Data Science
Workshops.description: In this workshop, you will gain a new ability to understand what's behind data and build prediction system built in machine learning models as first step to enter AI field, using pandas to manipulate data to make it ready for the next process, and using matplotlib to see the insights and try to make decisions.
